name: Last ticket for Eternity
description:
Made in ±2 days for the first IndieTale Jam ! Thème : One Room.
Linux & mac version below. How to avoid known bonjour gs below.

Board the train of date while you relive the événements of a funest night. In this dark murder mystery game, you'll investigate a train with strange passengers to answer two questions : how did you die and can you prevent it from happening ?

Length : 10 min
WARNING known bugs : speak to the wife a second time the first time you see her and DONT answer no. Or else you'll crash. (that's what happens when you say no to your wife XD)

Controls :
Move : arrow keys
Interract / choose option : point & click
Skip dialog : space
Move forward / backward in time : go to the right / left of the screen.

There are 3 endings : the true ending is the one with the choice at the end.

SPOILERS : how to get the true ending : get the word that the barman bring to your wife + don't drink blue cocktail or drink coffee after the blue cocktail.

Linux & Mac versions. Note : these have been uploaded after the jam, no modifications to the game have been made. This is the same game as the submitted version (or else it'd be cheating)
Mac : https://drive.google.com/file/d/126T_ZOdOUmdwR0pNVpNakB4FARqg8kN9/view?usp=shari...
Linux : https://drive.google.com/file/d/17u9I5CzRM3z4J7ZyhF_KodR1r_tHce5i/view?usp=shari...
